page.title: 13GRAFFHAM POLICE
page.content: Our local policeman has a car in which he patrols his 'patch'. He must check that people have a fire-arms licence if they own a gun. He must help the people to make sure there are no burgularies. Our liaison officer loves working with children. He trained for 3 months & had 2 years practice. He visits 36 schools altogether. He teaches us about safety at home, road, & farm. He reminds us to be careful on bonfire night & warns us about being friendly to strangers. Sometimes mothers ask him to speak to their naughty children. In secondary schools he speaks to the older children about driving cars, riding motor cycles, the stupidity of drinking & driving & the taking of drugs.
